title: Augmented Reality-Based Network Cabling Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic network concepts and hands-on experience with fundamental cabling tasks
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education using augmented reality-based intelligent tutoring systems in smartphone-limited tech environments, combining offline workshops and online AR practice sessions

learning_goals: Learners can perform cable connections between physical switch racks in VLAN environments with 85% accuracy.
Learners can self-correct cabling errors within 3 steps via real-time feedback systems.
Learners can independently perform 90% of complex cabling procedures after 3 practice sessions using checklists and AR guidance.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
